title: Child for Child conducts guiding session for students for Mathematics Olympiad
description:
Olympiad Examinations helps in identifying a child’s capability and real potential that may help him/her survive better in today’s modern competitive world. They motivate students to endeavor for better and deeper understanding of scientific facts to enhance their reasoning, analytical and problem solving skills. They also bring out the areas where the students lack in proficiency so that proper orientation can be provided for improvement.

Child for Child in association with Mr. Mohit Jain founder of MJ Magic Studio and an executive coach for many professionals, organized a Webinar for students to help them with some tips & tricks to perform better in their Math Olympiad. The focus was on mathematical reasoning and abstract reasoning for students from grades 5, 6 and 7. It is a part of mathematics where we determine the truth values of the given statements. All the students greatly benefited from the session and their confidence was boosted two folds.

During the pandemic CFC team has been conducting sessions for schools in various thematic areas that work towards their physical & mental wellbeing. Some of the online sessions facilitated by CFC under its Value Shop vertical include mastering Penmanship, Magic of Mathematics, Cyber Safety Awareness, Musicality, Art of Storytelling, career Counseling, amongst a few.
